name: Both or Nothing
description:
You are lost in a forest. Alone, you have built a fire. You are cold and hungry, and there is not much around you. With what little you can find, you will have to keep yourself alive, but do not forget to feed the fire or you will freeze to death.

Note:
If the game does not enter your browser window press (control + -) to adjust the size of the window and be able to play correctly.

Developers:

 -Victor Reiner: Programmer, Music and SFX. (https://twitter.com/victor_reiner)

-Shubi_Art*: Artist. (https://twitter.com/Shubi_Art) (https://www.instagram.com/shubi_art/?hl=es)

* She make commissions
